Note.Summary: Summary... Watch the music box, Mangle’s aggression, Toy duo’s teamwork, and mask timing. Toy Freddy, Foxy and Balloon Boy are threats, and old Freddy and Mangle are slow to leave!
Note.Night1.Part1: I need to make sure that I keep the music box wound up!
Note.Night1.Part2: Mangle seems to be more aggressive than usual...
Note.Night1.Part3: Toy Bonnie and Toy Chica are trying to gang up on me. Maybe I can time putting on my mask with Mangle to knock all three out at once.
Note.Night1.Part4: Toy Freddy likes to turn off the breakers, I need to listen out for his laughs.
Note.Night1.Part5: Mangle takes the longest to trick with the mask—perhaps I can use that to my advantage.
Note.Night2.Part1: I need to keep an eye on Foxy in the hallway tonight!
Note.Night2.Part2: Balloon Boy isn’t an old friend I’d ever want to meet again. I’ll need to watch both him and Foxy!
Note.Night2.Part3: The older Freddy takes forever to leave the office, almost worse than Mangle... I think.
Note.ToysRevenge: The toys and only the toys are really aggressive tonight!
Note.PowerOutage: It's pretty stormy tonight, I expect to see some power surges...
Note.ChaosShuffle: The Animatronics seem a bit quirky tonight... Every hour when the lights flicker all Animatronic levels shift to a random number!
Note.Overtime: My manager asked me to work extra hours tonight, I guess my shift will last until 9AM...
